input_text:
Job Title: SCA Drafter/CAD Operator 4

Location: North Charleston, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
GovCIO is seeking an Drafter/CAD Operator IV to provide SolidWorks and AutoCAD drafting support to the Navyâ€™s Fleet Submarine Very Low and Low-Frequency Broadcast Engineering Support team.

Responsibilities

 Work with engineers and subject matter experts (SMEs) conducting research necessary to produce Assembly Drawings, Interconnect Diagrams, and all associated lists for production level technical data packages that adhere to MIL-STD's Create basic 3D parts and assemblies of mechanical equipment in Solidworks to validate dimensions and "fit" into overall assembly, and translate into 2D drawings for Installation Design Packages.  Work with GOTS and COTS equipment and document as related to overall system design where no Solidworks design is needed.  Prepare detailed indentured parts lists and LOMs.  Read engineering drawings and translate information for diverse audiences or edit for use in other supporting documents.  Work with project engineers and technicians to ensure all data is properly documented that is required to build the various assemblies and parts.  Produce basic network interconnect diagrams.  Basic photography skills, image cropping, and ability to incorporate images into documentation as needed.  Redline and make amendments to documents maintaining strict revision, documenting, and file control.  Follow and execute document review processes to obtain correct document approvals.  Participate in Physical Configuration Audits validating documents against physical equipment. 

$27.90 per hour

Qualifications

Clearance Required: Secret

Education: Associate's degree from a school in drafting or illustration.

Experience: Two (2) years of experience drafting/illustrating in the electronics field, to include: computerized drafting applications, digital imaging techniques, use of AutoCAD, planning and preparing graphic presentations of complex items. Experience with DoD processes and procedures.

OR

Education: High School diploma or GED.

Experience: Five (5) year of experience drafting/illustrating in the electronics field, to include: computerized drafting applications, digital imaging techniques, use of AutoCAD, planning and preparing graphic presentations of complex items. Experience with DoD processes and procedures.

#NSS #TMK #DSG

 Posted Salary Range 

USD $27.92 - USD $28.90 /Hr.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: SCA Drafter/CAD Operator 4
output_json.summary: GovCIO seeks a Drafter/CAD Operator IV for SolidWorks and AutoCAD drafting support.
job_responsibilities: Work with engineers and SMEs on research for technical data packages.
Create 3D parts and assemblies in Solidworks.
Ensure proper documentation for assembly and part building.
Basic photography and image editing skills.
